CustomField.description: * Sharing: Indicates that sharing settings for the object will control access to the object's records., * View: Indicates whether the all object's records can be viewed (or not), regardless of the sharing settings for the object. Includes private records (records with no parent object). * Modify: Indicates whether the all object's records can be viewed, edited, or deleted (or not), regardless of the sharing settings for the object. Includes private records (records with no parent object).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: * Sharing: Indicates that sharing settings for the object will control access to the records. * View: Indicates whether the all records can be viewed (or not), regardless of the sharing settings for the object. Includes private records (records with no parent object). * Modify: Indicates whether the all records can be viewed, edited, or deleted (or not), regardless of the sharing settings for the object. Includes private records (records with no parent object)
CustomField.label: All Records
